member.name: T:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput
member.summary: 核心输入组件

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnCancel
member.summary: Occurs when The system cancelled tracking for the touch, as when (for example) the user puts the device to her face.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnCancel2Fingers
member.summary: Occurs when the touch count is no longer egal to 2 and different to 0, after the begining of a two fingers gesture.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnTouchStart
member.summary: Occurs when a finger touched the screen.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnTouchDown
member.summary: Occurs as the touch is active.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnTouchUp
member.summary: Occurs when a finger was lifted from the screen.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnSimpleTap
member.summary: Occurs when a finger was lifted from the screen, and the time elapsed since the beginning of the touch is less than the time required for the detection of a long tap.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnDoubleTap
member.summary: Occurs when the number of taps is egal to 2 in a short time.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnLongTapStart
member.summary: Occurs when a finger is touching the screen, but hasn't moved since the time required for the detection of a long tap.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnLongTap
member.summary: Occurs as the touch is active after a LongTapStart

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnLongTapEnd
member.summary: Occurs when a finger was lifted from the screen, and the time elapsed since the beginning of the touch is more than the time required for the detection of a long tap.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnDragStart
member.summary: Occurs when a drag start. A drag is a swipe on a pickable object

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnDrag
member.summary: Occurs as the drag is active.

members.member: Occurs when a finger that raise the drag event , is lifted from the screen. /

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnSwipeStart
member.summary: Occurs when swipe start.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnSwipe
member.summary: Occurs as the swipe is active.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnSwipeEnd
member.summary: Occurs when a finger that raise the swipe event , is lifted from the screen.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnTouchStart2Fingers
member.summary: Like OnTouchStart but for a 2 fingers gesture.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnTouchDown2Fingers
member.summary: Like OnTouchDown but for a 2 fingers gesture.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnTouchUp2Fingers
member.summary: Like OnTouchUp but for a 2 fingers gesture.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnSimpleTap2Fingers
member.summary: Like OnSimpleTap but for a 2 fingers gesture.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnDoubleTap2Fingers
member.summary: Like OnDoubleTap but for a 2 fingers gesture.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnLongTapStart2Fingers
member.summary: Like OnLongTapStart but for a 2 fingers gesture.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnLongTap2Fingers
member.summary: Like OnLongTap but for a 2 fingers gesture.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnLongTapEnd2Fingers
member.summary: Like OnLongTapEnd but for a 2 fingers gesture.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnTwist
member.summary: Occurs when a twist gesture start

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnTwistEnd
member.summary: Occurs as the twist gesture is active.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnPinch
member.summary: Occurs as the pinch gesture is active.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnPinchIn
member.summary: Occurs as the pinch in gesture is active.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnPinchOut
member.summary: Occurs as the pinch out gesture is active.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnPinchEnd
member.summary: Occurs when the 2 fingers that raise the pinch event , are lifted from the screen.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnDragStart2Fingers
member.summary: Like OnDragStart but for a 2 fingers gesture.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnDrag2Fingers
member.summary: Like OnDrag but for a 2 fingers gesture.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnDragEnd2Fingers
member.summary: Like OnDragEnd2Fingers but for a 2 fingers gesture.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnSwipeStart2Fingers
member.summary: Like OnSwipeStart but for a 2 fingers gesture.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnSwipe2Fingers
member.summary: Like OnSwipe but for a 2 fingers gesture.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnSwipeEnd2Fingers
member.summary: Like OnSwipeEnd but for a 2 fingers gesture.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnMInputIsReady
member.summary: Occurs when input is ready.

member.name: E:MingUnity.InputModule.MInput.OnOverUIElement
member.summary: Occurs when current touch is over user interface element.

member.name: T:MingUnity.InputModule.MGesture
member.summary: This is the class passed as parameter by MInput events, that containing all informations about the touch that raise the event, or by the tow fingers gesture that raise the event.

member.name: F:MingUnity.InputModule.MGesture.swipe
member.summary: The siwpe or drag type ( None, Left, Right, Up, Down, Other => look at EayTouch.SwipeType enumeration).

member.name: F:MingUnity.InputModule.MGesture.swipeLength
member.summary: The length of the swipe.

member.name: F:MingUnity.InputModule.MGesture.swipeVector
member.summary: The swipe vector direction.

member.name: F:MingUnity.InputModule.MGesture.deltaPinch
member.summary: The pinch length delta since last change.

member.name: F:MingUnity.InputModule.MGesture.twistAngle
member.summary: The angle of the twist.

member.name: F:MingUnity.InputModule.MGesture.twoFingerDistance
member.summary: The distance between two finger for a two finger gesture.

member.name: M:MingUnity.InputModule.MGesture.GetTouchToWorldPoint(System.Single)
member.summary: Transforms touch position into world space, or the center position between the two touches for a two fingers gesture.
member.param: The z position in world units from the camera or in world depending on worldZ value

member.name: M:MingUnity.InputModule.MGesture.GetSwipeOrDragAngle
member.summary: Gets the swipe or drag angle. (calculate from swipe Vector)
member.returns: Float : The swipe or drag angle.

member.name: M:MingUnity.InputModule.MGesture.NormalizedPosition
member.summary: Normalizeds the position.

member.name: M:MingUnity.InputModule.MGesture.IsOverUIElement
member.summary: Determines whether this instance is over user interface element.
member.returns: true if this instance is over user interface element; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MingUnity.InputModule.MGesture.IsOverRectTransform(UnityEngine.RectTransform,UnityEngine.Camera)
member.summary: Determines whether this instance is over rect transform the specified tr camera.
member.returns: true if this instance is over rect transform the specified tr camera; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MingUnity.InputModule.MGesture.GetCurrentFirstPickedUIElement(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the first picked user interface element.
member.returns: The first picked user interface element.

member.name: M:MingUnity.InputModule.MGesture.GetCurrentPickedObject(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the current picked object.
